skillTree.name: Haeyndrik's Shield
skillTree.description: The god of money, wealth and power protects it's patrons with a shield of coins.

skillTree.name: Walk through the Fog
skillTree.description: If the Staatholder's Fog Walkers would be nearly as effective as Lisette Leerer when it comes to remaining unseen, Marienburg would be in a much different place.

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Suiddock's Straight Razor
skillTree.description: In Suiddock she's known as the Guild's Razor, a tool she frequently uses on those with the guts to make a move on her.

skillTree.name: Stevedore's Trickery
skillTree.description: Trafficking goods untaxed in and out of Suiddock is vital in the Guild's success.

effects.description:
Maximum cargo capacity: +20% for caravans
	(accompanying Lord)

Reduce the charge in extortion events: -25%
	(accompanying Lord)

skillTree.name: Poisonous Attire
skillTree.description: She sells potions and goods as a front one of the buzzling markets of Marienburg, skimming batches of poison as a side hustle.

skillTree.name: Leather Trafficker
skillTree.description: The Leather business is much more profitable as one would imagine. It's easy to get your hands on, as you can harves it from a lot more than just cattle.

skillTree.name: Bouncer
skillTree.description: Having served as the personal bodyguard for many a crime lord, Lisette knows how to keep her assets safe.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.name: Midnighter's Gift
skillTree.description: Finding the weakspots of equipment is just like cracking a safe, and Lisette has plenty of experience doing just that.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +20%

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Scavenge
skillTree.description: "I am not here to inspire, I am here to kill - come let us draw blades together!"

effects.description: Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 3%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 8%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Increase Mobility
skillTree.description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Block Army
skillTree.description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Guild's Enforcer
backgroundSkills.description: ''What makes the Thievies guild a disciplined organization instead of thieving rabble? Simple, Lisette Leerer''.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +35%

items.name: Adalbert 'Casanova' Henschmann
items.description: Someone once asked Casanova what he wanted from life. "I want more," was the reply, as he forced the questioner to sign over his business. He is interested only in money. His rule is harsh, and so long as everyone acknowledges that he is the boss then no one gets hurt. When people do get hurt, on the other hand, it's generally in a spectacular fashion.\\n\\n Adalbert deals with Lea-Jan Cobbius as an equal, and the two have healthy respect for each other's power. Between them, they keep the peace in Suiddock in a way the Watch can never match. \\n\\n
